input_text:
Job Title: Software Developer

Location: Whippany, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Inclusively is partnering with a multinational universal bank to hire a Software Developer. **Please note: this role is NOT an internal position with Inclusively but with the partner company.**
ABOUT INCLUSIVELY:Inclusively is a digital tech platform that connects candidates with disabilities, who may benefit from workplace accommodations, to inclusive employers. This includes all disabilities under the ADA, including mental health conditions (e.g. anxiety, depression, PTSD), chronic illnesses (e.g. diabetes, Long COVID), and neurodivergence (e.g. autism, ADHD). Applicants with one or more of these conditions are encouraged to apply; Inclusively does not require applicants to disclose their specific disability.
What will you be doing?On behalf of a global financial services organization, utilize software development lifecycle process knowledge to develop Ab Initio Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes to turn business requirements into IT data solutions, including designing data pipelines from beginning to integration with application and database endpoints Design and implement Data integration and Data Warehouse-based solutions using Hadoop platformBuild centralized data lake to create the capability of self-exploratory data analysis for data scientists Develop centralized product-level data warehouses to assist with performance of monetary, risk, and finance reportingDesign metadata lineage and data catalogs to understand data movement and lineage within the data warehouse and data lake to meet governing policies Build controls on top of data pipelines to ensure pipelines are meeting governance and compliance rules and audit as wellDevelop micro service ETL IT architecture consisting of cloud computing technology stack and work through and remove the scalability issues Design security policies across data access to ensure there is high level of securityBuild IT requirements for implementation and resolve issues on path back to BAU operationsSupport data analysis by optimizing SQL queries and provide technically sound solutions for the ingestion, storage and presentation of enterprise data including ETL design, data storage strategies, data access and securityDevelop, design, code and perform unit testing of complex software components for new or enhanced IT systems to a high level of quality, producing appropriate documentation while performing cost benefit analysis by driving the design of scalable solutions while considering all recoverable and resiliency requirementsEmploy agile techniques such as task estimation, test automation, deployment automation to enhance overall execution speed and product quality
What we’re looking for:Requires Master’s degree, or foreign equivalent, in Computer Science, Information Technology, Management Information Systems, or related technical field and one (1) year of experience in role offered, as a Full Stack Engineer, Computer Programmer, Programmer Analyst, or related occupationIn the alternative, employer will accept a Bachelor’s degree in the above stated fields and three (3) years of experience in the above stated occupationsMust have one (1) year of experience with: Performing Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) development tasks using Talend and InformaticaUsing Oracle and Teradata to optimize SQL queries for data processing and analysis in relational databasesUsing Bash Scripting, Python and R to develop code to process data from various source systems; and Performing data modeling/warehousing tasks, including designing pipelines for data ingestion and data processing to reduce redundancies

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Software Developer
output_json.summary: Software Developer position at a multinational universal bank.
job_responsibilities: Utilize software development lifecycle process knowledge to develop Ab Initio ETL processes
Design and implement Data integration and Data Warehouse-based solutions using Hadoop platform
Build centralized data lake for self-exploratory data analysis
Develop centralized product-level data warehouses for performance of monetary, risk, and finance reporting
Build metadata lineage and data catalogs
Ensure pipelines meet governance and compliance rules
Develop micro service ETL IT architecture
Design security policies for data access
Support data analysis by optimizing SQL queries
Optimize solutions for ingestion, storage, and presentation of enterprise data
Design, code, and test complex software components
Consider all recoverable and resiliency requirements
Employ agile techniques such as task estimation, test automation, deployment automation
output_json.company_information: Inclusively is a digital tech platform that connects candidates with disabilities to inclusive employers.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Applicants with disabilities are encouraged to apply.
